name: Metroidvania Month-X
description:
Waking from a nap, Mara finds that the space station she calls home has been overrun with psionic spirits.  She must defend herself and figure out whats going on.

Well, that was the original story, anyway.  Explore, find a means of self defense, and escape in this tiny metroidvania.

Arrow keys to move
Enter to start
X to jump
Z to shoot, once you get the gun.

Still in development.  Let me know what I should focus on polishing.
